Translations.Text: Weile baohu gu lai shen ren,
weile baohu tamen [de shang dui] dongji [ping'an daoda nanfang] he xiaji [ping'an daoda beifang] de luxing,
jiao tamen chongbai zhe zuo tian fang de zhu [an la].
Shi ta [an la] zai ji'e shi ci gei tamen shiwu, zai kongju shi ci gei tamen anning.
Ni kanjian fouren shenpan ri de ren ma?
[Wei xin de] libai zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Tamen shi hushi ziji de bai gong de,
tamen jujue zuo renhe shanshi [ru jie ren guo, wan, piao, pen deng riyongpin].
Wo que yi ci ni [mu sheng] duo fu [zhu] [huo leyuan li yitiao ming wei “kao sai er” de he],
suoyi, ni dang wei ni de zhu libai bing [wei ta] zaisheng.
Rang ni fennu de ren que shi juehou de [jinshi he houshi jie wu fu fen].
